values: 粗糙的；粗略的；大致的；粗暴的；艰难的；恶劣的；粗野的；汹涌的；高低不平的；不舒服的；猛烈的；不平滑的；不确切的；犯罪盛行的
粗略地；粗糙地；粗暴地；粗野地；未经修饰地；不平稳地；颠簸地
草图；草稿；草样；粗糙的设计；粗略的计划；（高尔夫球场的）深草区
粗加工；粗略处理；草拟；草画轮廓；使表面不平；使粗糙；粗暴对待

synonym.mean: 粗糙的；粗略的；粗野的；艰苦的；未经加工的
艰苦；高低不平的地面；未经加工的材料；粗糙的部分

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 略粗糙的；略粗暴的；有点刺耳的；略有风浪的
粗糙（度）；粗暴；猛烈；篷乱毛发；未加工
粗饲料；粗粮；粗糙的原料

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指嘶哑刺耳的声音，通常因高声喊叫后嗓子失音所致。
一般多指刺耳难听的声音。
指加工粗糙、不精细。也指某人的言行举止粗鲁无礼，缺乏修养。
主要指未经加工处理尚处于自然状态的物质；也可指人的言行粗鲁。
指外表、性质、声音的粗糙、刺耳、刺目，强调使人不愉快的粗糙感。
普通用词，指某物纹理不精细，或表面凹凸不平，不光滑。
指某物质地粗糙低劣或编织、加工等不精细、精巧。也指人的言谈举止粗鲁，不文雅。

word_group.brief_definition: 瑕疵, 美中不足之处
暂时过艰苦的生活, 渡过暂时的难关
顺其自然；好事坏事都接受, 既能享乐也能吃苦
word_group.phrase: take the rough with the smooth

word_group.brief_definition: 受到不良/不公平对待的处境, 苛刻对待
word_group.phrase: the rough end of the pineapple

word_group.brief_definition: 未经琢磨的钻石；外粗内秀的人
乱糟糟的局面；乱作一团；杂乱；混战；乱斗
粗糙但有效的；粗糙但尚能顶用的；不懂世故的；粗俗的；粗犷的；简陋的
喧闹的行为；粗鲁的行为；暴力行为
波涛汹涌的航程；艰难的历程

bilingual.source: We find out if they are smooth or rough.
bilingual.target: 我们发现它们是光滑的还是粗糙的。

bilingual.source: The huss is known for its rough skin.
bilingual.target: 狗鱼以其粗糙的皮肤而闻名。

bilingual.source: She scrapes her elbow on the rough wall.
bilingual.target: 她在粗糙的墙上擦伤了肘部。

bilingual.source: She had calloused feet from walking barefoot on rough surfaces.
bilingual.target: 她的脚因为在粗糙的表面上赤脚行走而起老茧的。

bilingual.source: The friction caused by the rough road slowed down the car.
bilingual.target: 粗糙的道路引起的摩擦使汽车减速。

bilingual.source: The scute on the snake's belly helps it move smoothly over rough surfaces.
bilingual.target: 蛇腹部的鳞甲帮助它在粗糙的表面上顺利移动。

bilingual.source: The artist likes to work with rough sketches before finalizing his drawings.
bilingual.target: 这位艺术家喜欢先用粗糙的草图进行创作，然后再完成他的画作。

bilingual.source: If you are rough luck lose your love.
bilingual.target: 假如你是粗糙的运气而失去你的爱。

bilingual.source: Look at him a rhinestone in the rough.
bilingual.target: 看看他,粗糙的人造钻石.

list.abstract: rough，英语单词，及物动词、不及物动词、形容词、副词、名词，作及物动词时意为“使粗糙；粗暴对待；草拟”，作不及物动词时意为“举止粗野”，作形容词时意为“粗糙的；粗略的；粗野的；艰苦的；未经加工的”，作副词时意为“粗糙地；粗略地；粗暴地”，作名词时意为“艰苦；高低不平的地面；未经加工的材料；粗糙的部分，人名；(英)拉夫”。
ROUGH是日本超红的女装品牌，以手工刺绣和徽章著称，在许多日本杂志上都有介绍。 在日本ROUGH分店有23家聘请了专业的服装设计师，设计出来的YY每款画面都很独特，,每个动物，或花草的图案都是纯手工剪、手工定、衣领平绒包边，一般的T恤，都不可能具备的做工，棉料也是水洗过再制成的，质地很柔软。

yingyinNormal.en: Can't make any promises, of course. Rough game, Quidditch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但不可能没事的，魁地奇很野蛮。

yingyinNormal.en: Nana liked it rough!
yingyinNormal.zh: 原来她老人家喜欢这调调！

yingyinNormal.en: Has it been a rough adjustment? It was a rough adjustment for us in high school.
yingyinNormal.zh: 适应的过程是不是特别艰难？反正对我们来说适应高中生活很艰难。

yingyinNormal.en: Rough numbers? This company was not built on rough numbers. Am I right Mr. Douglas?
yingyinNormal.zh: 大概数字？公司不是建在大概数字上，我说得对吗，道格拉斯先生？

yingyinNormal.en: You live with your mother? No. That's the sad part. Ooh, rough.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你跟你妈一起住？没有，不幸之处就在于此。太不幸了。

yingyinNormal.en: You've had a rough day today. Go to sleep, and we'll see tomorrow, OK?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你经历了可怕的一天，去睡一觉，我们明天再商量，好吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Why won't you sign it? I just think splitting up can be rough on kids.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么？离婚对孩子不好。

yingyinNormal.en: What? You love her. She loves you. It's just a rough patch, that's all.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么了？你爱她，她爱你，这只是个小矛盾，仅此而已。

yingyinNormal.en: How's Bernadette holding up? It's pretty rough. She's having a hard time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 伯纳黛特还坚持得住吗？还挺难的。她很难受。

yingyinNormal.en: 54-09 call. Go ahead. Dispatch. Listen carefully. We have a rough location.
yingyinNormal.zh: 编号54-09汇报。收到。请求支援，听仔细了，只有大致地点。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, if you wanna see some rough numbers, I can get them to you by Wednesday.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你想看大概数字，我可以在星期三以前给你。

yingyinNormal.en: Bit of flour on the bench. Get your dough out, shape it into a rough rectangle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在面板上撒一些面粉，取出面团，做成长方形。

yingyinNormal.en: Proper use of them can increase control, and reduce sea sickness during rough seas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 恰当的使用，会让船保持平稳，避免在海浪中晕船。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, well, I knew a guy on the force. He had it rough. Talked about eating his gun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我队上认识个人，他很绝望说要饮弹自尽。

yingyinNormal.en: Boy, Sophie could have used a time machine in that movie. Did you see it? It's rough.
yingyinNormal.zh: 厉害，苏菲在电影里是用过一个时间机器。你见过吗？挺刚猛啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. Yeah. That's gone. It's a rough month when Halloween and PMS hit at the same time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那堆啊，吃完了。万圣节和大姨妈一起来，我是屋漏偏逢连夜雨呀。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a little rough around the edges, but I'm just hoping you'll love what I put into it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 边缘不是很光滑，但我希望你会喜欢我放在里面的东西。

yingyinNormal.en: There we have our base dough. Now what I'm gonna try and do is force this into a rough ball.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最初的面团就这样，然后要做的是，揉成一个硬面团。

yingyinNormal.en: Orphaned at 10 when a shell collapsed their apartment building. Sokovia has had a rough history.
yingyinNormal.zh: 十岁的时候，所住的大楼遭到炮击，成了孤儿，斯科维亚过去战乱不断。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, you know, cool it. I've had a rough day. You think you're the first SpongeBob I've seen?
yingyinNormal.zh: 听着，别说那么多废话，我今天过得很惨，你以为你是我今天见的第一个海绵宝宝吗？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 粗暴地；凶暴地；粗糙地；大约；粗略地；大体上

word_family.mean: adj. 不平滑的；粗糙的；不平整的；不平坦的；粗鲁的；粗暴的；粗野的；粗俗的；未完成的；未加工的；粗制的；简易的；基本的

sense_info_list.en: (of a person or their behavior) lacking refinement or fineness
having an uneven or irregular surface
(of an area or occasion)characterized by or notorious for the occurrence of violent behaviour
the first version of a drawing or design that has been done quickly and without much detail
not finished tidily or decoratively; plain and basic
having large and dangerous waves
not exact; not including all details
hard; severe
wild and with storms
not feeling well
not smooth or pleasant to taste,
(of a voice)coming out with difficulty so as to sound harsh and rasping

word_usage.usage: rough作形容词时，可用于名词之前，修饰该名词，如：rough ground，也可用于系动词之后，如：His reply was a bit rough. 他的回答有点粗略。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 天气恶劣的; 有暴风雨的; 海面汹涌的
草稿; 草图; 简略的; 大概的
艰难的; 过艰难的生活

direction_info.description:

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 粗暴地；凶暴地；粗糙地；大约；粗略地；大体上

word_family.mean: adj. 不平滑的；粗糙的；不平整的；不平坦的；粗鲁的；粗暴的；粗野的；粗俗的；未完成的；未加工的；粗制的；简易的；基本的

sense_info_list.en: (of weather or the sea) wild and stormy
sense_info_list.zh: 天气恶劣的; 有暴风雨的; 海面汹涌的

examination_example.sentence: That may be one reason why so many people find relief in swimming when life's seas get <highlight>rough</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这可能就是为什么当生活变得波涛汹涌时，那么多人会在游泳中找到解脱的原因。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person or their behavior) lacking refinement or fineness

examination_example.sentence: Sometimes a young child may get over-excited, and they are a little too <highlight>rough</highlight>, but it's never a serious matter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时候小孩子可能过于兴奋，他们有点太粗暴了，但是这从来不是一个严重的问题。

sense_info_list.en: unpleasantly harsh or grating in sound
having an uneven or irregular surface

a preliminary sketch for a design;
not exact; not including all details

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 粗暴地；凶暴地；粗糙地；大约；粗略地；大体上

word_family.mean: adj. 不平滑的；粗糙的；不平整的；不平坦的；粗鲁的；粗暴的；粗野的；粗俗的；未完成的；未加工的；粗制的；简易的；基本的

examination_example.sentence: Whether it's <highlight>rough</highlight> physical play, outdoor play or pretend play, kids derive important lessons from the chance to make things up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论是粗暴的身体游戏、户外游戏还是假装游戏，孩子们都会从弥补错误的机会中获得重要的教训。

sense_info_list.en: having an uneven or irregular surface

examination_example.sentence: I remember the harsh acid smell of the cleaning solution and the scraping sound of stiff iron brushes against <highlight>rough</highlight> brick.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我还记得清洁剂强烈的酸味和坚硬的铁刷在粗糙的砖块上摩擦的声音。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Rough</highlight> calculations show that the savings made by employers when their staff works from home are of similar value.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 粗略的计算表明，当员工在家工作时，雇主节省的费用也差不多。

examination_example.sentence: Prices do vary depending on different factors, but as a <highlight>rough</highlight> estimate, it's around $ 2, 000.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 价格确实因不同因素而异，但粗略估计大约在2000美元左右。

sense_info_list.en: not finished tidily or decoratively; plain and basic
full of hardship or trials
sense_info_list.zh: 艰难的; 过艰难的生活

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: full of hardship or trials

examination_example.sentence: The trip they took me on was a <highlight>rough</highlight> one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们带我去的那趟旅行很艰苦。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 艰难的; 过艰难的生活

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: He found his parents' hands were so <highlight>rough</highlight> (粗糙的) and pale because of washing a lot of clothes in the cold water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他发现父母的手因为在冷水中洗了很多衣服而变得粗糙苍白。

examination_example.sentence: They were <highlight>rough</highlight>, simple and cheap with different numbers of strings, from two to even six.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们粗糙、简单、便宜，有不同数量的线，从两根到六根。

examination_example.sentence: These rovers can drive over rocks and all kind of <highlight>rough</highlight> ground.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些漫游者可以在岩石和各种不平的地面上行驶。

sense_info_list.en: full of hardship or trials
sense_info_list.zh: 艰难的; 过艰难的生活

examination_example.sentence: We see the warning signs and signals when things get <highlight>rough</highlight> and difficult.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当事情变得艰难时，我们看到了警告信号和信号。

examination_example.sentence: All you need is just a <highlight>rough</highlight> (粗略的) one.
However, the <highlight>rough</highlight> (汹涌的) waves made it too hard for Paul to push the boat to land.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，汹涌的海浪使保罗很难把船推到岸上。

examination_example.sentence: You might be surprised to hear that the number of people sleeping <highlight>rough</highlight>(露宿)in London.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 听说伦敦有这么多人露宿街头，你可能会感到惊讶。
